scripts.build: npm run jshint && npm run uglify && npm run css
scripts.uglify: node node_modules/uglify-js/bin/uglifyjs app/js/libs/jquery.js app/js/libs/codemirror.js app/js/app.js  -mc -o app/js/script.min.js
scripts.css: cat app/css/bootstrap.css app/css/style.css app/css/bootstrap-responsive.css app/css/codemirror.css | node node_modules/clean-css/bin/cleancss -o  app/css/main.min.css
